title: Netflix Mails Final Red Envelope This Week As DVD Service Shuts Down
description:
Netflix previously announced that their DVD rental service would be coming to an end. Now, sadly enough, it looks like they’ll be mailing out the final red envelope this week. Funnily enough, the first DVD shipped by the service happened to be a copy of Beetlejuice. This signaled the launch of Netflix’s rental-by-mail model in […]

The post Netflix Mails Final Red Envelope This Week As DVD Service Shuts Down appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: Disney Delays Troubled Marvel MCU Series For Third Time
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has faced more than a few issues in recent years. Now the MCU is now being impacted by the WGA and SAG-AFTRA strikes. It’s been revealed that the strikes have prompted the latest of multiple delays for an upcoming MCU series. The Disney Plus series Echo is set to revolve around […]

title: ‘Saw’ Producers Have Sequels Planned Beyond ‘Saw X’
description:
The Saw movie franchise has become recognized for spawning a large number of sequels over the years. As such, many fans have wondered if there would be additional movies released after Saw X. Especially with so many unfinished storylines. Now, according to the new film’s producers, there are indeed plans for more Saw sequels from […]

title: Shrek’s Swamp Now Available To Rent On Airbnb
description:
The Shrek movie franchise has become iconic for its fairy tale characters and locations. Now one such location, Shrek’s swamp which goes back to the opening of the very first movie from Dreamworks, can now be rented by fans via Airbnb. The location is being featured for one weekend only this year, from October 27 […]
